invalid.title: Invalid Link
invalid.message: The activation link is not valid. This can happen if you have already confirmed your account.

success.title: Welcome to rotki
success.message: Your rotki account has been successfully activated. To see your dashboard click

common.confirm_hint: Enter the same password as before, for verification.

password_hint.line_1: Your password can't be too similar to your other personal information.
password_hint.line_2: Your password must contain at least 8 characters.
password_hint.line_3: Your password can't be a commonly used password.
password_hint.line_4: Your password can't be entirely numeric.

login.title: Sign in
login.message: Premium users unlock the full potential of rotki by removing all limits and unlocking all features.
login.alert_error: If you are writing your username and password from the app, we remind you that they are independent accounts.

password_changed.title: Password changed
password_changed.message: Your password has been successfully reset. Click below to log in.

password_link_send.title: Password recovery
password_link_send.message: A recovery link has been sent to your account's address. Please check your mailbox to proceed.

invalid.title: Invalid password reset link
invalid.message: The link you followed doesn't seem like a valid password reset link.

pending_activation.title: Please check your email
pending_activation.message: A confirm registration link has been sent to your account's address. Please check your mailbox to proceed.

step_4.title: Address
step_4.description: Will only be used for payment invoices

message.default:
Creating an account in rotki.com is only needed to purchase a {premium_subscription}. Rotki is a local application and the account you create when you use it is stored on your computer. 

 This is not the same account as premium and credentials for one account do not work for the other. To use Rotki simply {download} and run it. 

 Proceed only if you intend to purchase premium and unlock the premium features of the application.

form.username_hint: Required. Provide a unique username for your new account.
form.email_hint: Required. Provide a valid email address.

form.tos: I have read and agreed to the {tos} and the {privacy_policy}

form.name_hint: Required. Will only be used for invoice of payments.
form.company_hint: Optional. If you want to be invoiced as a company the given company name will be added to the invoice.
form.vat_id_hint: Optional. If you want to be invoiced as a company, the provided VAT ID will be added to the invoice.

account_deleted.message: Your rotki premium account has been successfully deleted.
account_deleted.title: Your account was deleted

country.hint: Required. Email us at {email} if you need to change your billing country.

api_keys.title: API Credentials
api_keys.not_generated: You haven't generated an API key

message.description: Your e-mail address has not been verified. Check your mailbox for the activation e-mail.
message.success: New activation e-mail has been sent

account.moved_offline: Your account details have been moved offline. For editing please contact {email}.

no_premium.title: Rotki Premium
no_premium.no_premium_found: No premium subscription found. Select your {plan}.

current_password.label: Current Password
current_password.hint: Enter your current account password. Only needed if you want to change password

delete_account.title: Delete account
delete_account.description: Proceeding will completely delete your account data. If you proceed you will not be able to recover your account!
delete_account.unable_to_delete: You cannot delete your account while you have an active subscription.

confirmation.description:
By proceeding you will delete your account and all its accompanying data from our servers. This action is not reversible. Are you sure you want to perform the deletion?

Type your username to continue: {username}

cancelled_but_still_active.description: You canceled this subscription, but it will remain active until {date}

cancellation.title: Canceling Your Rotki Subscription

subscription_status.normal: Please note that your current subscription, which was created on {start_date}, will run until {end_date}. Until then, you will be able to fully utilize all Rotki premium features.
subscription_status.pending: Please note that your pending subscription, which was created on {start_date} will never be billed if you cancel. We are sad to see you go.

benefits.1: Rotki is open-source software, and your subscription helps support its development.
benefits.2: If you cancel your subscription, you will no longer be able to use any Rotki premium features until you subscribe again.
benefits.3: We're constantly developing new premium features that will soon be available to our subscribers.

products.heading: Unlock the Full Potential of rotki with Premium Features
products.title: Upgrade rotki today
products.description: Elevate your financial management with rotki premium, our exclusive subscription offering. Gain access to advanced tools and features designed to enhance the management of your portfolio and investments.

unlock.title: Unlock Premium Features
unlock.description: Unlock the full potential of rotki with a premium subscription. Whether you're a seasoned investor or just starting out, rotki premium provides the tools and resources you need to succeed in today's dynamic financial landscape.

footer.description: Upgrade to rotki premium today and take your financial management to the next level. Enjoy enhanced features, greater flexibility, and exclusive perks designed for the modern investor.

sync_db_with_server.title: Sync data across multiple machines
sync_db_with_server.description: Effortlessly back up your data to our cloud and sync or restore it across multiple devices. Your data is encrypted and can only be decrypted with your password, ensuring complete privacy.

staking.title: Staking
staking.description: Track your staking activities across various chains and platforms like ETH, Liquity, Kraken, and more. Get detailed insights on total gains, performance, rewards breakdown, and individual staking events.

higher_limits.title: Higher Limits
higher_limits.description: Say goodbye to limits. With rotki Premium, you can process more trades, transactions, deposits/withdrawals, and historic events. The limits increase with each premium tier, providing greater flexibility and control.

detailed_graphs.title: Detailed Graphs
detailed_graphs.description: Access a wide array of analytics and graphs. Analyze your total net value over time, asset value distributions, and the worth distribution per asset or location.

defi.title: DeFi
defi.description: Gain detailed insights into supported DeFi protocols. Analyze your Liquity, Aave, Compound, MakerDAO positions. Understand your Yearn vaults and track your swaps on platforms like Uniswap, Paraswap and more.

exclusive_perks.title: Exclusive perks
exclusive_perks.description: Enjoy various perks like dark mode, customizable color layouts, and alerts for your MakerDAO CDP position, notifying you by email when it crosses certain thresholds.

timeframe.heading: Enhanced Customization Options
timeframe.title: Timeframe Customization on Dashboard
timeframe.description: Set the timeframe for the dashboard graph. Premium users have access to all options, while free users can choose between only "2 Weeks", and "1 Week".

theme_customization.title: Dark mode & theme customization
theme_customization.description: Reduce eye strain, improve text readability, and prolong your device's battery life with dark mode. Personalize the color scheme for both light and dark modes, and customize specific color palettes for the app theme within the settings

history_view.title: History view
history_view.description: Free users have a limit of the 100 most recent events in the history event viewer. As a premium user you have higher limits in the amount of events you can see.

trades.title: Trades
trades.description: Free users are limited to the 250 most recent trades. Premium users enjoy higher limits on the number of trades visible.

deposits_withdrawals.title: Deposit/withdrawals
deposits_withdrawals.description: Free users are limited to the 100 most recent exchange deposits/withdrawals. Premium users benefit from higher limits for viewing deposits and withdrawals.

user_notes.title: User notes
user_notes.description: Free users can add up to 10 notes. As a premium user, you have higher limits on the number of notes you can add.

asset_amount_and_value.title: Asset tracking
asset_amount_and_value.description: Access comprehensive analytics, including net value and asset amount over time for each owned asset.

distribution_locations.title: Value distribution
distribution_locations.description: View a distribution pie chart of your net value per location (exchanges, blockchain accounts, banks, etc.).

monerium_and_backup.heading: Enrich Transactions and Synchronize Data
monerium_and_backup.title: Monerium API Integration and Premium Data Backup

monerium_api_keys.title: Monerium API Keys
monerium_api_keys.description: Once you provide Monerium credentials as a premium user, all Monerium transactions on mainnet, Polygon, and Gnosis chain will be enriched with bank transfer data or chain bridging information.

data_synchronization.title: Data synchronization
data_synchronization.description: As a premium user, you can upload your encrypted database to our server, synchronize it across devices, and use it as a backup. Your data remains encrypted with your password, ensuring privacy. Synced databases are automatically deleted one month after your subscription expires.

supported_defi.title: Dedicated DeFi support for
supported_defi.caption: * All DeFi protocols are supported, these are just the ones we have dedicated views for.

hero.title: The portfolio manager that protects your privacy
hero.motto: rotki is an open source portfolio tracker, accounting and analytics tool that protects your privacy.

open_source.title: Open source
open_source.description: rotki's source code is available to inspect, modify and enhance.

local_app.title: Local app
local_app.description: rotki is a local-first application with a strong focus on user privacy.

own_your_data.title: Own your data
own_your_data.description: Your financial data is kept encrypted in your system and not shared with third parties.

home.use_app: rotki offers tracking of all your crypto assets no matter where they are. Be it on a blockchain,{0}a DeFi protocol or on one of the supported  exchanges.

asset_and_liabilities.title: Assets and Liabilities
asset_and_liabilities.description: View all of your assets and liabilities and your exposure to each as a percentage of your net worth.

net_worth_over_time.title: Net worth over time
net_worth_over_time.description: Users can also see a graph of how their total net worth is evolving over time. Free users are limited to the last 2 weeks.

exchanges.title: Exchanges
exchanges.subtitle: Connect to a big number of centralized exchanges
exchanges.detail: Connect to a big number of centralized exchanges and inspect current balances, historical trades, deposits and withdrawals.

defi.title: DeFi
defi.subtitle: Overview of all of your DeFi
defi.detail: Overview of all of your DeFi holdings in various protocols, historical activity details and profit loss calculation.

eth_protocols.title: Ethereum protocols
eth_protocols.subtitle: Ethereum DeFi protocol details
eth_protocols.detail: Details per protocol for some of the supported protocols:

maker_dao.title: Maker DAO
maker_dao.description: Which vaults you have open, how much you have in DSR

uniswap.title: Uniswap
uniswap.description: Your current LP balances, v2 and v3 trades

balancer.title: Balancer
balancer.description: Your current LP balances, and trades

eth_protocols.watcher_note: Premium users can set watchers for various protocols so that they can be informed via email when certain conditions are met.

profit_loss_report.title: Profit/loss report
profit_loss_report.subtitle: Profit/loss report for all your historical data
profit_loss_report.detail:
A profit/loss report across all the user’s assets, protocols, exchanges and blockchains is created for the given time range. The results can be exported into a CSV file which can later be imported to a spreadsheet or shared directly with your accountant.

Profit/loss report for free users has a transaction limit and does not take into account all possible protocols.

testimonials.title: Don’t just take our word for it
testimonials.detail: Hear from some of our amazing customers who are using rotki.

premium_features.title: Premium features
premium_features.subtitle: Enjoy all the potential that rotki offers.

graphs_and_statistics.title: Graphs and statistics
graphs_and_statistics.subtitle: Premium users can visit the graphs/statistics page and get graphs for:
graphs_and_statistics.detail:
Premium users can visit the graphs/statistics page and get graphs for:
Net worth over time
Asset amount and total asset value over time
Breakdown of total net worth per location
Breakdown of total net worth per asset

history.title: Higher limits for trades, transactions, deposits and withdrawals
history.detail: Free users have a limit on the number of transactions, deposits, withdrawals and other events they can see and process. Premium users have higher limits.

premium_defi.title: DeFi historical accounting, profit and loss
premium_defi.detail: See the entire list of activities you have done when interacting with a DeFi protocol. Get the profit/loss report for each protocol. Set watchers for various protocols to be informed via email when certain conditions are met.

dex_support.title: Decentralized exchanges
dex_support.detail:
See how much you have in each liquidity pool. All your Uniswap and Balancer LP join/exit events are shown along with the total profit/loss per pool.

Uniswap and Balancer trades are taken into account in the tax report for premium users.

premium_staking.title: Advanced staking
premium_staking.detail:
See how much of the token is staked per account.
What is the expected APR.
How much of the token you have earned by staking across all accounts.

See a list of all your staking events with links to the corresponding transactions.

free.title: Starter Plan
free.subtitle: Anyone can download the application and start using it for free.

premium.title: Premium Plan
premium.subtitle: Premium users unlock the full potential of rotki by removing all limits and unlocking all features.

advanced.title: Advanced
advanced.subtitle: Premium users unlock the full potential of rotki by removing all limits and unlocking all features.

custom.title: Want a custom tailored plan?
custom.subtitle: Get in touch with us to tailor the plan to your needs.

step_1.title: Premium Plans
step_1.description: Choose the different plans we offer
step_1.vat: The prices include a +{vat}% VAT tax
step_1.maybe_vat: VAT may apply depending on your jurisdiction
step_1.crypto_hint: * When paying with crypto the monthly price is {cryptoPrice} €

notes.1: The selected payment method will be billed the total amount for the subscription immediately.
notes.2: New billing cycle starts at UTC midnight after the subscription has ran out.
notes.3: An invoice is generated for each payment and you can access it from your account page.
notes.4: Subscriptions can be canceled from the account page at any point in time.

step_2.title: Payment Methods
step_2.description: Select one of the different methods
step_2.subtitle: Please select one of the following payment methods.

step_3.title: Payment Details
step_3.subtitle: Payments by crypto can have slower processing times.
step_3.payment_description: Payments are safely processed with Braintree a PayPal Service

change_payment.title: Change Payment
change_payment.warning: Changing the payment method after sending a payment can lead to problems with the activation of your subscription. Please only switch a plan if no payment has been sent.
change_payment.switch_agree: I confirm that no payment has been sent. {separator}Allow me to change the payment method.

metamask.notice: You can pay with metamask, your mobile wallet or manually send the exact amount to the following address above. Once the whole amount is sent and processed by our system, then a receipt will be sent to your email and your subscription will be activated.
metamask.paid_notice_1: If you already have made a transaction you don't need to do anything more.
metamask.paid_notice_2: You will be notified about your subscription via e-mail as soon as your transaction is confirmed.

notes.1: Please submit a payment request. Once that is done an email will be sent to your account with a payment request of the equivalent € amount of that cryptocurrency based on the rates given by CryptoCompare
notes.2: Once the whole amount is sent and processed by our system, then a receipt will be sent to your email and your subscription will be activated.
notes.3: Finally, when the end of the subscription period approaches an email with a prompt to generate another payment request will be sent.

saved_card.cannot_use_card: Something went wrong. Please refresh the page or use a different card.
saved_card.card_expired: The card has expired. Please use a different card.

delete.description: Are you sure you want to remove this card?

heading.description: Download now and start using across all major Operating Systems

documentation.heading: What are the first steps after installing rotki?
documentation.description: On our documentation page you have a user guide that will help you introduce yourself and clarify any doubts that may arise during the process.

error.unverified_email: You cannot currently buy a premium subscription. You need to first verify your e-mail address.
error.3d_auth_failed_message: The 3D Secure authentication of your card failed ({status}). Please try a different payment method.

crypto_success.message: You should receive an e-mail confirming the activation of your subscription in the near future.

change_plan.switch_warning: Switching a plan after sending a payment can lead to problems with the activation of your subscription. Please only switch a plan if no payment has been sent.

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.description: Everything you need to know about the app

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: Latest news and updates on rotki

jobs.title: Careers at rotki
jobs.description: Our mission is to empower users to take control of their finances both in and out of crypto in a transparent and auditable way while enabling them to own their data through a self-sovereign application.

values.title: Nice to meet you
values.subtitle: Our mission is to empower users to take control of their finances both in and out of crypto in a transparent and auditable way while enabling them to own their data through a self-sovereign application.

values_section.title: Values
values_section.description: We are driven by a set of core values that guide our every action and decision. Our commitment to these values is what sets us apart and ensures that our users receive the utmost quality and service.

1.title: We are:
1.value: a team of dedicated builders driven by our love for what we create. Our passion lies in developing applications that bring tangible value to our users. We believe in the power of open-source development, as it enables transparency, audibility, and the provision of user guarantees.

2.title: We build:
2.value:
- {open_source}: Because that's the only way to create transparent applications that can be audited and provide users with guarantees.
- {local_first}: Building local applications that store all data locally is the only way to guarantee data privacy and true ownership. Nobody can deny access to the app or the data to the user if it's a local application.

3.title: We welcome:
3.value:
external open-source contributors who understand our mission and utilise our product themselves, driven by the desire to help it reach its maximum potential.

Our team can independently shoulder their responsibilities, taking ownership of their work. We value teamwork and collaboration, emphasising the importance of collective effort rather than individual stardom.

vision_section.title: Vision
vision_section.description: rotki is the portfolio tracking, management and accounting tool for your finances. The one-stop app for viewing and managing your finances. rotki aspires to:

list.1: Be the one place to track your entire portfolio across on-chain crypto, banks, stocks, trades and more.
list.2: Allow you to manage your finances, perform trades across CEXes, on-chain swaps, and other brokers from one interface.
list.3: Create monthly/quarterly/yearly reports covering assets across all mentioned locations.
list.4: A modular system that many contributors outside our team can extend. For example, if someone wants to integrate tax accounting rules for a specific jurisdiction, they are experts on or integrate a chain they know of.

contact_section.title: Contact us
contact_section.subtitle: For media inquiries or additional information about Rotki, please reach out to:

notifications.changes_saved: Your changes have been successfully saved!

refund.title: Rotki Refund and Cancellation Policy
refund.policy: Rotki has features that can be used in a daily basis to assist users with assets, portfolio management and analytics. But one of the main features is assistance with tax reporting, which is something that is used infrequently. Due to this nature of Rotki subscription {non_refundable}. You can at any time cancel your subscription and from that point on no more payments will be made.
refund.accept_message: You need to accept the refund policy before proceeding

accept_policy.text: I have read and agreed to the {action}

integration.title: Connect your blockchains, connect your exchanges
integration.description: We support different blockchains, exchanges, and protocols to help you track, account for, and analyze your finances while protecting your privacy.

exchanges.title: Exchanges
exchanges.description: Connect to a big number of centralized exchanges.

protocols.title: Protocols
protocols.description: More than {number}+ DeFi protocols are supported.
